Name: Argol - Kronoss' Castle
About the game: Argol - Kronoss' Castle is a platformer action game largely inspired by 90s hits. Between gothic universe and mythological legends, it is decorated as it deserves with a rich and epic soundtrack to make you live an adventure in the purest arcade style. Story : Help Argol across his journey in the hostile lands of Rul until the gates of the Castle of Time in order to meet Kronoss, the sinister magician. Only him has the power to save his beloved from the terrible evil that gnaws at her. To achieve this, you will have to explore dark forests infested with monstrous creatures, and dungeons full of diabolical traps. No one other than you is capable of such a feat, and you can only rely on your courage and cleverness. Graphic design and programming: Olivier Poli Music: Solon Barraclough
